titles.title: Not By Works Of My Own Righteousness

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Not by works of my own righteousness
Shall I enter in to the holiest of all.
Not by my own might or power,
Shall I ever fulfill God's holy call.
Awaken me unto Thy righteousness
Awaken me to Jesus Christ within.
For only those who call upon Thy name
Shall be saved,
For by Thy life shall we be saved.
